heading: How I Work With Teams
intro: My work is grounded in clarity, rigor, and practical delivery — balancing long-term system thinking with real execution constraints.
principles: I work best with teams building something non-trivial
I get involved where architecture and execution decisions materially affect outcomes
I balance research rigor with real delivery constraints
I prioritize clarity over cleverness in every decision
Engagements may be advisory, hands-on, or hybrid — based on what the system needs

engagementPath.heading: Engagement Model

points.description: Start with a focused System & AI Architecture Review to identify architectural risks, AI fragility, and execution bottlenecks.
Align system direction with team capability and realistic growth constraints.
Step in with short-term, focused support to stabilize systems or take AI from PoC to reliable production — only when clear blockers exist.
Exit cleanly, leaving the team with clarity, artifacts, and decision frameworks that continue to work without me.
